roleset.name: to hit or push with force

example.name: intransitive
example.text: An Exxon official said that at this time the oil company does n't anticipate any additional charges to future earnings relating to the cleanup of oil spilled [*] when one of its tankers rammed into an underwater reef [*T*-1] .
